title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin lays out why the Denver Broncos should be considered legitimate Super Bowl contenders after the draft and winning the off season. He believes the Warriors have taken full control of the series against the Grizzlies after winning game 1. He tells you why he was right about Giannis Antetokounmpo and wrong about the Dallas Cowboys. Plus, Super Bowl champion James Jones joins the show in studio to talk about the Packers without Davante Adams and if the Cardinals have the best offensive weapons in the league right now.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
